price: Rabbim, bana bir işaret ver! dedi. Senin işaretin, sapasağlam olduğun halde ardı ardınca üç gece insanlarla konuşamamandır, buyurdu.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyan
